meanings.definition: To remove a perm from hair.
meanings.sent1: She depermed her hair to go back to her natural curls.
meanings.sent2: After years of having a perm, she finally depermed her hair.
meanings.sent3: The salon accidentally depermed her hair, leaving her with a straight look.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to deperm her hair was like hitting the reset button on her style.
meanings.sent5: The process of deperming her hair was both exciting and nerve-wracking.

meanings.sent1: Her depermed hair felt lighter and healthier.
meanings.sent2: She proudly showed off her depermed hair to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The depermed look gave her a fresh and natural appearance.
meanings.sent4: With her depermed hair, she felt like a new person.
meanings.sent5: The depermed style suited her better than the perm ever did.
